start:
👋 Hey there, friend!
Send me an Instagram username and I'll fetch the public info for you 😊
help:
👋 Hi friend!
Just send an Instagram username without the @ and I'll show you its public info 😄
You can change the language from the button below anytime.
about: I'm a tiny friendly bot powered by Instaloader 🤖
error_private:
🔒 Oops! This profile is private and I can't show its info.
Try another username or follow the account first.
error_not_found:
❌ Sorry, that user wasn't found.
Please check the spelling and try again.
error_connection:
⚠️ Something went wrong connecting to Instagram.
Check your connection and try again in a moment.
error_429:
⏳ Too many requests!
Please wait a bit and try again.
error_500:
😕 Instagram's server is having issues.
Please try again in a few minutes.
error_data:
🛠️ The data structure changed and I can't show the info right now.
Please try again later.
